meta.name: Financial Data Q&A Chatbot with Google Finance, SerpAPI, and OpenAI

parameters.content:
# üìä Chat with Google Finance  

This workflow connects a chatbot to **live financial data** from SerpApi and uses OpenAI to answer questions.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions  

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Add Your SerpApi Key  
1. Create a free account at [SerpApi](https://serpapi.com/)  
2. Copy your **API Key** from the dashboard  
3. In the **HTTP Request (Finance Search)** node, update the URL:  
https://serpapi.com/search.json?engine=google_finance&q=^GSPC&api_key=YOUR_API_KEY

Replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual SerpApi key.  

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Set Up OpenAI Connection  
1. Go to [OpenAI Platform](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)  
2. Navigate to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview)  
3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n  

---


## üì¨ Contact  
Need help customizing this (e.g., multiple tickers, daily summaries, or sending reports to Google Sheets)?  

üìß **robert@ynteractive.com**  
üîó **[Robert Breen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-breen-29429625/)**  
üåê **[ynteractive.com](https://ynteractive.com)**

options.systemMessage: =You are a helpful assistant. Take questions from the user and answer based on the market data.

3. Add funds to your billing account  
4. Copy your API key into the **OpenAI credentials** in n8n

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Add Your SerpApi Key  
1. Create a free account at [SerpApi](https://serpapi.com/)  
2. Copy your **API Key** from the dashboard  
3. In the **HTTP Request (Finance Search)** node, update the URL:  
https://serpapi.com/search.json?engine=google_finance&q=^GSPC&api_key=YOUR_API_KEY

üëâ Replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual SerpApi key.
